name: Hell`s Little Story 2
description: Hells Little Story 2 is a platformer in its best manifestations. A mixture of different game mechanics, shooting, attempts to escape from monsters and achievements - in this game there is all of this.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q8200 2.33GHz Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia 9600GT 512Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
